name: Conquer of Realms
description: 'Conquer of Realms' is a PG-rated game that allows players to escape reality and dive into a mystical world filled with mischief and powers. The game can be a form of passing time and stress relief for the player. We aimed for the target audience to be young girls between 7 to 15 years of age. Players will have to overcome obstacles and challenges throughout the game with the ability to collect items in order to pass the level.
